opp.PhysicalTrainUnitIdentifier.description: Defines a set of possible identifiers for a physical train (ETCS-trainRunningNumber, OBU-ID etc).

trainRunningNumber.description: Defines the Train Running Number for ETCS same as SS026.NID_OPERATIONAL. To be usable for ETCS must contain a decimal number [0..99999999]. Mapping to uint32 by filling with F: '1233' -> 0x1233FFFF

additionalTrainRunningNumber.description: Defines the distinction between Operational Train Units with the same trainRunningNumber. This may occur if a trainRunningNumber is reused for different spare trains.

tafTapTsiTrainID.description: refers to taf tap tsi train id

leadingOnBoardUnitId.description: Defines NID_ENGINE. To be usable with ETCS must contain a decimal number [0..16.777.215]

opp.EtcsDataAto.description: Defines static train capability data reported by ATO

trainLength.description: Defines the train length,0 if unknown

maximumSpeed.description: Defines the maximum applicable speed, use 0 if unknown

cantDeficiencyCategory.description: Defines the cant deficiency category of the train

nominalRotatingMass.description: relates to total train weight. 16 if unknown

brakePercentage.description: Defines the brake percentage. 255 if unknown

preconfiguredBrakingModel.description: Defines preconfigured braking model for the train. Use 255 if unknown

brakePosition.description: Defines the active brake position for the train

opp.AdditionalTrainData.description: Defines dynamic train characteristics, which are not primary for the timetable (therefore 'additional')

maxAvailableTractiveEffort.description: Defines the maximun available traction effort. Use 65535 if unknown

maxAvailableTractivePower.description: Defines the maximun available traction power. Use 65535 if unknown

maxAvailableDynamicBrakeForce.description: Defines the maximun available dynamic brake force. Use 65535 if unknown

maxAvailableDynamicBrakePower.description: Defines the maximun available dynamic brake power. Use 65535 if unknown

maxAvailableServiceBrakeForce.description: Defines the maximun available service brake force. Use 65535 if unknown

regenerativeBrakeState.description: Defines the state of the regenerative brake

magneticShoeBrakeState.description: Defines the state of magnetic shoe brake

eddyCurrentBrakeState.description: Defines the state of eddy current brake

electroPneumaticBrakeState.description: Defines the state of electro pneumatic brake

adhesionIndependentBrakeState.description: Defines the adhesion independent brake state

availableAdhesionCategory.description: Defines the available adhesion categories;053 in Subset

availableAdhesionPhysicalValue.description: Defines the available adhesion value. 600 if unknown

opp.DoorData.description: Defines availability of a door and last open time.

lastPassengerExchangeTime.description: Defines the last passenger exchange time. Use 65535 if unknown

opp.PhysicalVehicle.description: Defines a single carrige inside of a physical consist.

vehicleOrientation.description: Defines the orientation of the vehicle with respect to the train unit

doorDataLeft.description: Defines the left door data. Left is with respect of normal orientation

doorDataRight.description: Defines the right door data. Right is with respect of normal orientation

pantographsStates.description: Defines the state of the pantograph

opp.PhysicalConsist.description: Defines an un-splittable part of the train

evnIdentifier.description: Defines the european vehicle number (EVN) 12 digits,use 0 if unknown

passengerLoad.description: Defines hte passenger load. Use 255 if unknown

mass.description: Defines the train mass including load. Use 0 if unknown

maxCurrentConsuption.description: Defines the maximun current consumption. Use 1023 if unknown

physicalVehicles.description: Defines the physical vehicles part of the physical consist. empty=unknown

description: Defines train capabilities reported by ATO from the train.

issuedAt.description: Defines the issue-point in time with microsecond-precision builds a version-id for acknowledgements and validity-estimations, in UTC

operationalPlanMovement.description: Refers to the operational plan movement. If the new train was created in TrafficCS it does not have an operationalPlan (Movement) yet

mass.description: train mass including load, 0 if unknown

outsideTemperature.description: Defines the outside temperature. Use 127 if unknown

etcsData.description: Defines the valid ETCS Data for the train. Not provided if invalid

elapsedStartPassengerExchange.description: Defines the time elapsed between standstill and the doors are released for operation or opening; 4096: unknown

additionalTrainData.description: Defines additional train data as part of ATO capabilities report

physicalConsists.description: Defines the list of physical consists. Empty if unknown
